programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Al and Dwight go rogue on a recon mission for Ginny to follow a lead thought lost, but Al must choose between what she has now and what she's chasing.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: John is settling in as one of Virginia's rangers when a mysterious death sends him on an investigation that makes him question everything he thought about himself.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Dwight and Sherry team up with a mysterious faction of people to take down Ginny; when Morgan unexpectedly offers to help, a power struggle ensues.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.sub-title: Bury Her Next to Jasper's Leg
programme.desc: A deadly explosion in the oil fields sends June on a mission to save as many lives as possible; an investigation by Virginia threatens to undermine June's work.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Lt. Joe Leaphorn and Sgt. Jim Chee investigate the disappearance of a Navajo boy; Manuelito makes a sinister discovery while adjusting to life on the border patrol; an FBI agent comes to solve a case linked to Leaphorn's recent past.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn and Chee find themselves on a manhunt after making a shocking discovery; Special Agent Washington questions Leaphorn about a person of interest; Manuelito puts her job on the line when she searches for answers at a local ranch.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: After a close call, Leaphorn and Chee follow the trail of a new suspect; the discovery of a body sends Special Agent Washington in a different direction; Manuelito puts a target on her back as she digs deeper into the mystery.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: A stand-off occurs between Virginia, her rangers and Morgan's group; Ginny has made a lot of enemies and it's finally catching up to her.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: A threat worse than Virginia is on the horizon; Morgan calls for unity and invites all survivors to his settlement, tasking Daniel to keep the peace; however, Daniel will need to face his own challenge in hopes of protecting his friends.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: An infiltration turns rescue mission as members of the group dig deeper into an underground community.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Grace wakes up with a case of amnesia and sees what has become of her friends after she has been gone for years; she struggles to put the puzzle pieces together on what has transpired.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: June splits off from the group in an effort to gather any information to help stop an oncoming threat.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Alicia is held prisoner by Teddy; there, she reunites with old friends and must confront her past if she hopes to move on and escape.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: In a race against time to stop Teddy's plan, motives are revealed and convictions are tested as Morgan and his allies infiltrate and make their way through the beached submarine that holds the tools for Teddy's destruction.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Everyone desperately scrambles to live out the coming destruction on their own terms.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: A dysfunctional blended family is forced together when they realize the onset of the undead apocalypse is upon them.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Madison tries to keep Nick from withdrawal; Travis sets out to locate his son before Los Angeles falls.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: After they escape a riot, Travis, Liza and Chris seek refuge with the Salazars; Madison defends her home.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Madison and Travis see different sides of the National Guard's occupation in their neighborhood; the family tries to adapt to the new world.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: The National Guard's plan for the neighborhood is revealed; Travis and Madison make a difficult decision.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: As civil unrest grows, and the dead take over, Travis and Madison try to devise ways to protect their families.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: The families flee Los Angeles on Strand's yacht and find yet more danger at sea.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group seeks shelter with a survivalist family; Madison searches for the family's true motives while Salazar tries to uncover Strand's.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Madison confronts Strand about his undisclosed destination; Nick, Alicia and others inspect a plane crash site.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group lets a family in distress board the Abigail; Strand's past begins to come to light; Nick looks for an associate of Strand's.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Alicia works toward reuniting with her family; Travis comes across a familiar face; Madison and Nick try to save their family against all odds.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Conflict arises as the Abigail approaches its destination; Chris makes a staggering decision; Nick meets a new maternal figure.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: The family faces their biggest test yet; Nick, Madison, Travis and others try to stay close to each other.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: A multitude of guests and scientists explores everything from human origins to groundbreaking archaeological finds, new understandings of the cosmos, and the profound possibility that humans are not alone in the universe.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: While more than 1.5 billion people believe in reincarnation, ancient astronaut theorists suggest that extraterrestrials designed the human body to be a vessel for otherworldly entities.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Theorists suggest that compelling evidence of extraterrestrial visitation exists in China, the cradle of one of the earliest and most influential civilizations on Earth.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Up to 70% of UFO sightings happen in hot spots; examining what attracts UFOs and extraterrestrial visitors to these locations.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The White House has consistently denied having any knowledge of alien craft visiting Earth, but presidential encounters with UFOs and other strange phenomena can be found going all the way back to George Washington.

programme.title: South Park: Hotter than Summer: Miss Teacher Bangs a Boy
programme.desc: Miss Teacher Bangs A Boy: Power goes to Cartman's head when he becomes "Dawg the Hallway Monitor". Meanwhile, Kyle is shocked to discover his little brother Ike and his teacher are at "it"! (S10, E10)
programme.sub-title: Hotter than Summer: Miss Teacher Bangs a Boy

programme.title: South Park: Hell on Earth 2006
programme.desc: Hell On Earth 2006: Satan has a Sweet 16 style party in L.A. on Halloween! The gang perform a ritual and manage to summon Biggie Smalls - who demands Butters helps him get to the party! (S10, E11)

programme.title: South Park: Go God Go (Part 1)
programme.desc: Go God Go (1): Cartman is impatient to get his hands on the latest games console. Result? A visit to the atheistic future of 2546! Richard Dawkins pays a visit to South Park Elementary. (S10, E12)

programme.title: South Park: Go God Go XII (Part 2)
programme.desc: Go God Go XII (2): Cartman is stuck in the future, caught up in a battle between atheists and sea otters! And what will become of Richard Dawkins and Mrs. Garrison's love affair? (S10, E13)

programme.title: South Park: Stanley's Cup
programme.desc: Stanley's Cup: In a parody of underdog sports films, Stan is sentenced to community service and ends up coaching the Park County Pee-Wee hockey team - can he turn these losers into winners? (S10, E14)

programme.title: South Park: With Apologies to Jesse Jackson
programme.desc: With Apologies to Jessie Jackson: Randy faces public ridicule for using the "N" word on live TV. Cartman can't resist teasing a little person who comes to school to teach about prejudice. (S11, E01)

programme.title: South Park: Hotter Than Summer: Cartman Sucks
programme.desc: Cartman Sucks: After being caught in a compromising position with Eric, Butters is sent to a special camp to "Pray the Gay Away". Cartman tries to retrieve the incriminating photo. (S11, E02)

programme.title: South Park: Lice Capades
programme.desc: Lice Capades: Eric tries to discover the source of an outbreak of lice at the school. The lice are living peacefully in a village until they see the school nurse staring at them! (S11, E03)

programme.title: South Park: The Snuke
programme.desc: The Snuke: The citizens of South Park are gearing up for the arrival of Hillary Clinton. Eric suspects that a new student is planning a terrorist attack but the real culprits are deadlier. (S11, E04)

programme.title: South Park: Fantastic Easter Special
programme.desc: Fantastic Easter Special: Stan sets out to find a reason for painting Easter eggs and discovers his father is part of a society called "The Hare Club For Men", but all is not what it seems. (S11, E05)

programme.title: South Park: D-Yikes!
programme.desc: D-Yikes!: Ms. Garrison decides that she is a lesbian after getting dumped again but hell breaks loose when her new favourite lesbian bar faces a takeover from Persians in a '300' stylee. (S11, E06)

programme.title: South Park: Night of the Living Homeless
programme.desc: Night of the Living Homeless: When a plague of homeless people hits South Park, the boys devise a plan to move them on whilst the adults panic like they're in a zombie movie. (S11, E07)

programme.title: South Park: Le Petite Tourette
programme.desc: Le Petite Tourette: Cartman experiences bliss when he discovers that, by pretending to have Tourettes, he can say whatever he likes to whoever he likes! Naturally, national TV beckons. (S11, E08)

programme.title: South Park: More Cr*p
programme.desc: More Cr*p: Inadvertently, Randy breaks the world record for the 'biggest cr*p'! Bono, the previous holder, is determined to regain his crown - but he has a dark secret which may stop him. (S11, E09)

programme.title: South Park: Imaginationland: Episode I
programme.desc: Imaginationland - Episode I: The boys find themselves in a magical land where all of the world's imagination is laid out before them. (S11, E10)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When the boys discover Terrance and Philip have called it quits, they'll go to any lengths to reunite the duo and recruit them for South Park's Earth Day festivities.
programme.sub-title: Terrance and Phillip: Behind the Blow

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman inherits a million dollars from his grandmother and fulfills his lifelong dream of owning his own amusement park: Cartmanland!

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: In a time-honored tradition and right-of-passage, the boys are separated from the girls and schooled in the mysteries of sex by none other than Mr. Mackey.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When the government steals their new Gamesphere, the boys will stop at nothing to get it back.

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: In a very special episode of 'South Park,' Cartman fights for Kenny's life when he speaks before Congress in favor of stem-cell research.

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: As the country becomes obsessed with a popular program for losing weight, the boys see an opportunity to become sponsored by a major restaurant chain.

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When the boys learn that talk shows offer prizes to people who are grossly disfigured they can't sign Butters up fast enough.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan is appalled when he realizes the veal he's been eating is, in fact, the meat from little baby calves.

programme.desc: Cartman gets kicked out of the gang when Bebe develops boobs and the boys lose their minds, threatening their friendships and society as we know it.

programme.sub-title: Roger Ebert Should Lay Off the Fatty Foods

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman is pursued by the FBI for committing a hate crime and lands in juvenile hall.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman decides to seek friendship using the Internet and finds an older man who is more than willing to be his friend...and more.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman's family and friends have intervened and are forcing him to trim down. While Cartman's away, Kenny's star is on the rise when he gets his own reality TV show.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: After the other boys explain to Cartman that pubes don't count unless you grow your own, Cartman realizes he's been tricked by the school bully, Scott Tenorman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman inherits a million dollars from his grandmother and fulfills his lifelong dream of owning his own amusement park: Cartmanland!

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman plans to learn all of Butters' innermost secrets and then use them against him, by pretending to be Butters' new best friend, a robot named AWESOM-O.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: After sustaining a severe head injury, Cartman appears to have the power to see into the future. South Park detectives are quick to enlist his help in cracking unsolved murder cases.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman is sure he's dead and Butters is sure that Eric Cartman's ghost is haunting him. Together they attempt to make amends to all the people Cartman has wronged over the years.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: After the sudden on-set of the disease Gingervitis, Cartman rallies all other ginger kids to rise up and assume their role as the master race.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Al Gore warns the school about the threat of Manbearpig.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When Cartman's mom realizes she can't control her son anymore, she gets help from an expert. The "Dog Whisperer" may have what it takes but Eric Cartman's not going down without a fight.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: South Park Elementary faces strong opposition to the topic of evolution. Cartman's too busy to notice as he plans to propel himself into the future on the precise release date of the newest, hottest game console.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Eric Cartman has frozen himself in an attempt to make his three-week wait for a Nintendo Wii pass quickly. A freak accident landed him over 500 years in the future and now, he's stuck in a Godless world on the brink of war with no Nintendo Wii.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When his "ultimate plan" to embarrass Butters backfires, Cartman struggles to keep his classmates from seeing a compromising photograph. Meanwhile, Butters is sent to a special camp where they "Pray the Gay Away."

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman discovers the joys of having Tourette’s syndrome. Drunk with the power of saying whatever he wants without getting in trouble for it, he lines up national TV coverage to take advantage of his new life with no filters.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman finds himself fighting for his life after a routine tonsillectomy goes wrong. When Kyle becomes infected with Cartman's ailment, the two won't stop for anything as they search for a cure that will reverse their otherwise certain mortality.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The Coon rises from the trash and takes his place as a lone vigilante who wipes out crime in the town of South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman's dream of living the life of a pirate will come true if he can just get to Somalia.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman is chosen to do the morning announcements at South Park Elementary.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman’s favorite restaurant has been shut down and replaced by a store that sells medicinal marijuana. Randy is desperate to get a prescription card to buy pot and Cartman will do anything to get his beloved fried chicken back.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman dreams of being a NASCAR driver and he’s willing to do whatever it takes to make it happen.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman throws a fit when the boys' penis sizes are posted on the school bulletin board, and is sent to anger management therapy.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The 99% is ganging up on Eric Cartman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The time has finally come for Cartman to let a special someone know exactly how he feels.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman finally admits he's fat and immediately gets a mobility scooter.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman infiltrates the NSA and doesn’t like what he finds in his personal file.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman sees Token as a threat to all humanity.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Randy is harboring a giant secret and the pressure is getting to him. Meanwhile, Cartman calls Stan a cissy.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman considers himself the top on-line restaurant reviewer in South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle chooses Stan, Kenny, and Butters to celebrate his birthday at Casa Bonita. When Cartman finds out he's not invited, he arranges for Butters to conveniently go "missing."

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: As Mr. Garrison enjoys his new womanly attributes after his sex change, the rest of the town gets in touch with their inner feelings too.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys try to rescue their new friend Willzyx, a talking space whale, from the Denver Sea Park, and with the help of MASA (Mexican Aeronautica y Spacia Administracion) get him home to the moon for $200.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle and his family are moving to San Francisco. The only way Stan can get his best friend back is to convince everyone to start driving hybrid cars.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When the entire contents of the world’s imagination lay open before them, Stan and Kyle step right in. Back in South Park, Cartman swears he’s seen a leprechaun.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan and Kyle are being held in the bowels of the Pentagon until they tell the government how they got into Imaginationland. Meanwhile, Cartman simply won’t rest until he finds Kyle and gets him to make good on their bet to suck his balls.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Inside Imaginationland, Stan and Butters engage in the battle of their lives as they fight the army of evil imaginary forces. Meanwhile, Cartman goes all the way to the Supreme Court to get Kyle to pay up on their bet.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan and Kyle are hooked on Guitar Hero. Unfortunately, Stan’s superior skills on the video game damage his friendship with Kyle.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The girls in the fourth grade class have made a secret list that rates every boy’s looks from cutest to ugliest. When the boys steal the list, they are completely unprepared to deal with the results.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Randy steps forward with a solution to fix the desperate state of the economy.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan takes action to stop the Japanese from killing the world’s whales and dolphins.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The latest in scientific testing reveals that some of the boys at South Park Elementary have a sex addiction problem.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: New Jersey is taking over the nation one state at a time. Randy and the boys take a stand as the Jerseyites approach South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle is intimately involved in the development of a revolutionary new product called HumancentiPad.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle gets in on the ground floor of Cartman’s latest business venture, The Crack Baby Athletic Association.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys are getting close to discovering the truth about the first Thanksgiving.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When Ike hits puberty, he and Kyle start to grow apart. To save their relationship, Kyle takes Ike to see a live performance of Yo Gabba Gabba.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle just wants to play video games with his little brother. But, when Ike doesn’t want to play with him anymore, Kyle is afraid that the next generation is passing him by.

programme.desc: Cartmaan Bra is trending as the country prepares to watch the biggest Holiday Spectacular ever.

programme.desc: Kyle's mom won't let him keep his new pet, an elephant because it's so huge. So the boys turn turn to the Dr. Mephesto to genetically engineer a smaller elephant.

programme.desc: While South Park Elementary is attempting to stage a non-denominational holiday play that won't offend (or entertain) anyone, Kyle checks himself into the South Park mental asylum.

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: CBS Mornings
programme.desc: Hosts Gayle King, Tony Dokoupil and Nate Burleson set out to unite CBS' morning landscape with their lively and original reporting on international news stories during the weekday program's first hour, while expanding on feature reporting during the second hour with live interviews as well as in-depth pieces, covering topics from news, sports, climate and technology to race, health, parenting and personal finance. The team broadcasts from a new state-of-the-art studio in New York's Times Square.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew mistakenly receives death benefits and spends the money on a motorcycle, adopting a dangerous persona.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Steve forces Mimi and Drew into a truce. Drew isn't happy about Kate's handsome new boyfriend.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew tries to prevent Lewis from going to hell, but Lewis becomes overzealous in his reforms.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew foolishly assigns Oswald the task of delivering the store's Easter baskets to their customers' houses.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew and Mimi's cousin both want to be named the guardian of Steve and Mimi's baby.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew's new girlfriend gets Lewis in trouble after Drew reveals Lewis's involvement in a toxic dumping program.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew tries to conform to his activist girlfriend's lifestyle, but he ends up corrupting her instead.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew is appointed manager of a new store, but a jealous Mimi launches her most diabolical prank campaign ever.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Kate, Lewis, and Oswald help Drew escape from the insane asylum, but Mr. Wick appoints Mimi as manager.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.sub-title: Drew Gets Out Of The Nuthouse
programme.desc: In a big dance number, Drew proves he has recovered and gets released from the insane asylum.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew remains married to both Nicki and Kate, though neither woman realizes she is not Drew's only wife.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: When Nicki and Kate discover Drew married them both, they get their revenge and leave him alone.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew tries to win Kate back with a grand gesture, but it only makes things worse. Drew forgives Mimi.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: The new owner promises to promote Drew but dies from a heart attack after a prank at Drew's Halloween party.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew serves as a sex therapist for his parents. Mimi gives advice to Drew's mom on how to fix her marriage.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: In an improvised live episode, Drew and his friends are joined by the stars of "Whose Line Is It Anyway?".

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: The staff must deal with the store's new efficiency expert, Christine, who makes life miserable for everyone.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew has ended marriages with Kate, Nicki, and Mr. Wick, and now he's dating his new boss, Christine.

programme.desc: Celia is mortified when Isabel is recruited to model for a plus-sized children's clothing line.

programme.title: Weeds
programme.desc: The Armenian mob muscles in on Nancy's grow house while she deals with Silas and Megan's pregnancy.

programme.desc: Nancy and Conrad fear their grow house has been raided by the DEA, but all remains mysteriously untouched.

programme.desc: Nancy copes with Andy's grow house accident, Silas's plummeting grades and Shane's new crush.

programme.desc: It's business as usual, except the hospital has been purchased by the multinational corporation Quantum Bay.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Worried about Grace, Jackie leaves rehab early against the medical advice of her counselor.

programme.desc: Nancy plans a family dinner while tending to her pot business.

programme.title: Stoked on Fishing - Back Country Trout Fishing
programme.desc: What a journey it's been over the last three weeks! We kicked off our adventure in Eastern Sears Creek, making our first casts to see what the waters would yield. From there, we headed to South Lake for some laid-back pontoon trout fishing. After a relaxing day by the lake, complete with apple pie and cold beverages, we followed expert advice from Jared to venture back into the heart of nature. Our trek led us to Long Lake, nestled just above South Lake, offering more stunning views and fishing spots. Today on Stoked on Fishing, we're picking up where we left off. We'll dive deeper into understanding the lakes, figuring out what the rainbow and brook trout are biting on, and trying our best to land a few. Join us as our backcountry adventure continues.

programme.title: Stoked on Fishing - Exploring the Sierras: Owens River Fly Fishing
programme.desc: Wow, holy Eastern Sierra! It's been a full month of trout shows, and we've been trying to cover as much as possible with trout fishing in the creeks above Bishop. We teamed up with Jared at South and Sabrina Lake, and then we did a day hike back into God's country to Long Lake, which was incredible. Today on Stoked on Fishing, we're stopping by Mammoth's one and only Rick's Sports Center to get schooled on some fly fishing on the Owens River, just above Lake Crowley. I promise you, this is an ending to a show you won't want to miss. Ryan got a big one; Ryan got a big one!

programme.title: FishON! - Spring on the Ivanhoe: Post-Spawn Walleye Adventures
programme.desc: In Episode 3, we navigate the serene waters of the Ivanhoe River, embracing the beauty of spring as we target post-spawn walleye. With rods in hand, we explore the river's productive fishing spots, uncovering the best techniques and tips for a successful catch in this transitional season. From scenic backdrops to thrilling strikes, this episode captures the essence of spring fishing at its finest.

programme.title: Hook 'n Look — Hunger is the Best Pickle
programme.desc: South Dakota’s scenic Lake Oahe sets the stage for this week’s episode. Although well known as a walleye fishery, Kim and Cheyenne Ridge Signature Lodge, General Manager, Sean Finley reveal the under-utilized fishery within the overpopulation of smallmouth bass and respectable northern pike. Strike King’s Dream Shot Worm is the featured lure.

programme.title: FishON! - Experience Fishing at Ole's Adventure Lodge
programme.desc: Join us as we travel to Ole's Adventure Lodge on the picturesque Whitefish Lake, just west of Thunder Bay, Ontario. In this special episode, we shine a spotlight on the Experience Fishing program, dedicated to introducing the joys of angling to children, new Canadians, and women. Witness the excitement of first-time fishing adventures in a breathtaking setting that inspires connection with nature and community.

programme.title: Divorce Court
programme.desc: The venerable courtroom show takes a look at real-life couples. The soon-to-be exes tell their stories to the judge, who gives the ruling and settles all the usual -- and unusual -- divorce issues by the end of the episode. This is the third incarnation of the show titled "Divorce Court," with the first having premiered in 1957.

programme.title: The Nightcap
programme.desc: On The Nightcap we explore and question other lifestyles and cultures with an enthusiastic, open mind and hope to leave our viewers happily pondering new perspectives. The show's unique set has a full bar with a rotating cast of bartenders pouring up unique cocktails you can try to replicate at home. Whether it's inviting the most provocative guests to the signature pink couch or hearing your take on controversial topics, the conversations never disappoint. From game night to ordering in munchies, The Nightcap will keep you wanting more. It's sexy, it's risqué, it's everything you wouldn't expect from late-night TV.

programme.title: Dirty 30
programme.sub-title: "Lake Okeechobee - A Look Inside Pro Bass Fishing"
programme.desc: In the second episode, we follow Mike Iaconelli to the Bassmaster Elite Series on legendary Lake Okeechobee. As the camera rolls, we dive deep into the fishing world, shedding light on the industry and exploring the untold stories from Ike’s incredible 30-year career on the road. - From behind-the-scenes moments to raw, unfiltered insights, this episode peels back the curtain on what it really takes to thrive in professional fishing. Get ready for some dirt, real talk, BIG FISH, and an up-close look at one of the sport’s most legendary figures.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Similar to any good Cajun dish, a successful duck camp requires preparation. The last day on dry land is filled with essential stops to get ready for 5 days on the Bayou. Whether making sure we have the right ingredients for our favorite meals, or getting the boats brushed up and ready for action, the day before can be just as important as the day of.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle Green explores the 10,000 islands off the West Coast of Florida on his Sea-Doo while trying to catch fish after red tide. If the idea of camping off the grid, only eating what you catch, and discovering remains of thousand-year-old civilizations excites you, this is an episode you won't want to miss.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: Danny meets up with Jeff Coffee of ZOE angling group to talk shop, tie flies and fish in one of the most biodiverse lakes in the country.

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.sub-title: "Alaska's Massive Marvels: A Boating Expedition through America's Last Frontier Pt 2
programme.desc: From battling towering 12-foot waves in the Gulf of Alaska, to reeling in colossal 200 lb. halibut, they discover firsthand the rugged beauty of America's 49th state. This episode highlights Lindell Yachts as a top builder of rugged offshore sportfishing yachts, as well as Radon Boats as great pilothouse fishing and guide boats.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Louisiana's Wild Food & Award-Winning Cuisine - Hog Hunting, Swamp Fishing & MORE"
programme.desc: In Episode 2: New Orleans, Josh links up with Mason Hereford (owner of award-winning sandwich shop Turkey and the Wolf) and then hits the road for some epic hog hunting, swamp fishing, crawfish and oyster harvesting, and exploring Louisiana’s only water buffalo dairy farm. It all culminates in one incredible feast featuring unique regional dishes prepared by Mason with the help of some local friends.

programme.title: Fishing With Jay
programme.desc: READY TO ROLL!!…almost - We have our bus. We have our boat. And we have Mr. J. Rockfish on board to steer the ship. But before we can hit the road, we’ve got some work to do. - The bus…it needs a new motor and maybe some other stuff (TBD) that’s been hiding under 40 years of crust and crud… - The boat, it needs some fiberglass work. A casting platform and floor would be cool…maybe a paint job. - And Jay, well his gear is pretty shot, and his normally ripped physique has been obscured under some COVID poundage he acquired over the past year or so…And maybe a pedicure and haircut are in order before stepping in front of the camera… - First, the bus. A little interior decorating perhaps. - The 14 seats built for preschoolers don’t quite accommodate over-sized fishing dudes. And, come to find out, there are no rod racks. No bar. No stereo. No beds. No fly-tying stations. And no beer fridge. How did those kids survive? - Time to gut this thing…Check it out! #fishingwithjay.

programme.title: Fishing With Jay
programme.sub-title: "Fly Fishing For Snook in Indian River Lagoon"
programme.desc: With Tampa Bay suffering from a tragic red tide, Court left his home waters to fish with Jay and Casey in our backyard, the flats of Indian River and Mosquito Lagoon.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh heads offshore for the first day of red snapper season with his friend Joe Koenraad.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: We love our members. We spent some time in camp with Ron Chandler. Ron Recently renewed his TTHA Membership in 2022 and was awarded a member hunt for 2023. We spend time reflecting on what hunting means to Ron and spending time in camp at G2 with hunters alike.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Follow TTHA President/CEO Christina Pittman and her husband Matt this week as they tag along side Dr. James Kroll for his annual deer day! This is a great opportunity to learn from one of the best. We are blessed to be able to share his knowledge with other like minded outdoor enthusiasts.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Cable is a huge supporter of Texas Hunting and everything Teas Trophy Hunters. We are blessed to spend a few days with hum at the beautiful Saddle Creek Ranch in Brady Texas. Greg has a tight management plan and we are glad we got to enjoy his ranch with him and his team.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: We love our college chapters. Hudson has been a long time member of TTHA as well as serving with the Texas A&M Chapter. We have a great time at G2 in pursuit of Axis deer.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Exploring New York City's Hidden Culinary Gems: Cooking Goat Brains, Lobster & MORE"
programme.desc: New. York. City. That’s where our host Josh Rosen kicks off his journey in Episode 4—and where he lived for 16 years and started up the surf-centric apparel brand, Saturdays NYC. Back in his old stomping grounds, Josh first meets up with the award-winning chef and Mumbai native, Chintan Pandya, currently blowing up the New York food scene with his unapologetic and authentic Indian cuisine (pro tip: try the goat brains). Next, Josh travels through the boroughs, heads upstate, and along the coast to source local ingredients—from sake brewers and pig farmers to catching fresh lobster just 100 miles from Wall Street. As always the adventure will end with a feast, right back in Chintan’s kitchen.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Alaskan Fishing, Foraging, & Mountainside Cooking with Local Legends"
programme.desc: Hop in the float plane—a new episode of DIRT just dropped. The DIRT crew made their way to Alaska, “the land of earth, sea, and sky.” All feast, no sleep is the name of the game as Josh makes the most of Alaska’s abundant and legendary daylight alongside local guides, fishermen, and even a couple grizzlies. There’ll be plenty of time to hibernate in winter. But for now—join us—there are halibut to filet, rainforest ’shrooms to forage, and mountainside meals to cook up.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: Ryan Miller targets exotic fish in Lake Ida with local guide Kevin Cannon in Episode 2 of FinQuest. Catching peacock bass and clown knife fish, Ryan also enjoys family fun with a skimboarding session in Jupiter, Florida.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: In Episode 3 of FinQuest, Ryan Miller joins Captain Alex from Supremacy Fishing Charters for an offshore adventure targeting big fish off shore. Starting at the Palm Beach Inlet, the team uses planar fishing techniques to hook wahoo and other catches like kingfish and amberjack. Along the way, firefighter Johnny Bennett shares his journey from fishing to starting a popular fish dip business. The day wraps up with thrilling doubleheader catches and a conservation message, showcasing the importance of sustainable fishing practices.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: In Episode 4 of FinQuest, Ryan Miller explores Jupiter’s Inner Coastal Waterway, blending fishing, paddleboarding, and community engagement. With the help of Matthew from Jupiter Live Bait, Ryan showcases bait preparation techniques before catching snook in the vibrant ICW. He highlights Jupiter's community spirit by joining a local clean-up initiative with Jeremy from Blue Line Paddleboards. The episode features paddleboarding adventures with Ryan’s family, connecting with nature and marine life, and ends with a conservation message about preserving Jupiter’s pristine environment.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: In Episode 5 of FinQuest, Ryan Miller dives into the vibrant world of offshore fishing off the coast of Palm Beach County. Joined by Cabo Mike, they showcase expert bait techniques and strategies, reeling in a variety of catches, including bonita and a stunning mahi mahi. The duo shares insights into their fishing setup, explains the use of daisy chains, and celebrates their exciting day at sea. With breathtaking views of the ocean and a colorful array of fish, Ryan’s passion for saltwater fishing shines through. The episode wraps up with a reflection on the beauty and bounty of Palm Beach County waters.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: The story of Team Winchester shooters Zach Kienbaum and Desirae Edmunds is told. Zach and Desi discuss how they got started in the shooting sports and how important coaching has become to both of them. They also talk shooting tips. Theo Ribbs breaks down the shotgun sports while Chris Keefer, Casey Keefer, Paul Sawyer, Nikki Boxler and Gabe Adair have a friendly sporting clays competition.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: The Pacific Northwest does not have the easiest conditions to train in for this shooting sports team. For this Seattle-based SST Ravens, this skeet and trap team finds that the challenging weather they train in comes in handy when competing. Also: Competition shooting tips form pro shooter Theo Ribbs.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Every spring brings a new opportunity to take a step forward & recall the memories of seasons past. World War II Veteran and retired Judge Arden Hill has spent most of his life chasing turkeys in the hills of Tennessee. Now in his 90’s, Arden doesn’t let age stand in the way of his love for spring turkey hunting. Also: patterning turkey shotguns and hunting spring gobblers.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Winchester introduces the Shoot United brand aimed at offering useful information and tips to the millions of new shooters entering the shooting sports. New York native and Midland University competitive shotgun shooter Amy Cawley and her journey as a student-athlete is followed. Also: Theo Ribbs gives shooting tips for competition and Foster Bartholow reviews Winchester AA Diamond Grade.

programme.title: Ship Shape TV
programme.desc: During this episode of Ship Shape TV Essentials the SSTV team is at - John’s lake house on Tupper Lake, NY. They are checking out some of the damage done to John’s pontoon decking from freezing weather they received. John and the team are upgrading the material, and adding carpeting to the pontoon decking. We also get some information on SPX-Johnson bilge pumps and the ease of access they provide.

programme.title: Ship Shape TV
programme.desc: During this episode of Ship Shape TV Essentials the SSTV team is at - John’s lake house on Tupper Lake, NY, where they are tackling a new paint Job using Interlux’s paint specifically designed for aluminum hulls. John and the crew take us step by step on what takes to paint on aluminum hulls as well as some other tips from guest hosts.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.sub-title: "Opening Week in Mississippi started off with a BANG!!"
programme.desc: Opening day in Mississippi has arrived and Slade is taking full advantage of it! With the weather not cooperating Slade and Zeb stumble into a turkey hunt they won't soon forget. Two days later, the hot streak continues with Slade connecting on another turkey on an 83 acre property he has for sale! Also, Slade gives some tips and his ideas on small acreage hunting, and how it can be just as lucrative as big tracks of land!

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, Slade and his son take on the turkey woods for an afternoon hunt. Although the woods remained quiet, a tom soon snuck out of the woods and on the end of Bentley's barrel! After that Slade was able to help a client of his harvest his first turkey! And boy was it an action packed hunt! Jakes, hens, and tons of gobbles, This hunt is spectacular! Lastly, Slade introduces a property that we have already made a video on, but with just how amazing the land is, we had to include it! Floweree is the epitome of a sportsman's paradise!

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: When overnight temps go low and the tides go lower, it forces Redfish to move. Justin & Travis break out a new micro skiff to see how low they can go to ambush shifting redfish on the flats.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: It’s playtime for Travis & Justin when offshore guide Josh Sauls shares a secret honey hole and his fishing ancestry. Then luck shines when the guys find another sweet spot on the way back.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: The irresistibly serene gulf waters off Panama City Beach lure Justin into taking Capt. Ed Zyak out to see what's biting. It quickly turns into a study session and a lesson. Patience + perseverance = success.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Justin has spent a lifetime buying, selling and rigging boats to fit his angling needs. Learn what you need to ask yourself before shopping for the perfect boat and what to look for at the dealership.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: Will Cooper finally trades 3 years of tough times for triumph in his quest to tag an out-of-state buck with a bow.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: Join Will Cooper on an unforgettable adventure in the Colorado mountains, where he dedicated three years chasing elusive bull elk without success. Determined to turn the tide, Will enlists the expertise of his good friend Jermaine Hodge, prior World Elk Calling Champion and Wrestling Coach for the United States Army World Class Athlete Program. Together, they face challenges and overcome adversity during a thrilling public land over-the-counter rifle hunt. Experience the highs and lows of their journey against the stunning backdrop of Colorado's wilderness.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: In the wide world of western big game, pronghorn antelope hunting in Wyoming is unmatched in its accessibility and excitement. It’s an active pursuit, typically ripe with plenty of opportunities to spot and stalk black-horned bucks. This makes it an ideal forum for riflemen looking to scratch their western itch.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: After several years of shifting focus back to his native whitetails, Dahlke returns to mule deer country with the Muley Freak, Erik Van Woerkom. Follow along on this Utah mule deer hunt.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.sub-title: "Second Chance - Hunting the November Rut in Ohio"
programme.desc: Hunting has a way of grounding us, reminding us of what truly matters: shared moments and unforgettable memories. Chance and Ashleigh Eckert are on their first out-of-state hunt in the rolling hills of Ohio. After overcoming a life-changing kidney transplant, their story is one of faith, love, and resilience. While the goal was a big buck, the true reward was the time spent together and the lessons learned along the way. Because hunting is about so much more than the harvest — it’s about the journey.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Knowing when to spot and stalk is crucial for any hunter. In this episode of DDH-TV, Mark Kayser breaks down three key factors for success, while Dan Schmidt puts them into action as he stalks a buck in Nebraska’s Sandhills.

programme.title: Pure Hunting
programme.desc: Good friend Mike Stone invites Willi to hunt his family ranch in Oklahoma. Good friend, Tom Petry goes along to film for his school, “Film The Hunt” and hopefully capture Willi shooting a good, Oklahoma buck.

programme.title: Pure Hunting
programme.desc: Willi spends 8 days chasing a few bucks, but has sights set on “High Beam”. After a few encounters and one on his last morning, he hopes for last minute success on his last afternoon.

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.sub-title: Road Trips - "Crazy Rut Chaos In Georgia- Realtree Road Trips"
programme.desc: Filming your own bow hunts can be challenging. Throw in some crazy rut chaos and it can be just about impossible. Bouncing around in a Summit climber proved to be a deadly tactic for Bryan Brown as he was able to get tight to the bedding area where 5 bucks were chasing 1 hot doe.

programme.title: Realtree Road Trips
programme.desc: Join Bryan Brown, Rigsby Stewart, and Chase Herndon along with Lee Ellis on our annual opening week hunt in Northern Nebraska. Big Bucks were spotted and a tag was punched on an unexpected buck on opening day!

programme.title: Winchester Life

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Charles Rodney’s relationship with his hunting dogs, passion for field-to-table living and connection to the land make his love for chasing rabbits contagious while the heritage of Winchester’s small game ammunition makes this beloved pastime accessible for generations to come. Also: a Model 42 collection for the ages and hunting Kansas coyotes with the Keefer Brothers.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.sub-title: "Half Way There - Chilean Wigeon & Rosy Bill - , South America Waterfowl Slam"
programme.desc: Mark Peterson closes out the half way point on the South America Waterfowl Slam. On just the third day of the hunt, he is able to take a Chilean Wigeon and a Rosy Billed Pochard which make species number 9 and 10 of the 20 on his list. Mark is still sharing the blind with Matt Gindorff, a WTA consultant, and they discuss waterfowl hunting in Argentina and how it compares to that of the U.S.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: In Episode 4 of FinQuest, Ryan Miller explores Jupiter’s Inner Coastal Waterway, blending fishing, paddleboarding, and community engagement. With the help of Matthew from Jupiter Live Bait, Ryan showcases bait preparation techniques before catching snook in the vibrant ICW. He highlights Jupiter's community spirit by joining a local clean-up initiative with Jeremy from Blue Line Paddleboards. The episode features paddleboarding adventures with Ryan’s family, connecting with nature and marine life, and ends with a conservation message about preserving Jupiter’s pristine environment.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: In Episode 5 of FinQuest, Ryan Miller dives into the vibrant world of offshore fishing off the coast of Palm Beach County. Joined by Cabo Mike, they showcase expert bait techniques and strategies, reeling in a variety of catches, including bonita and a stunning mahi mahi. The duo shares insights into their fishing setup, explains the use of daisy chains, and celebrates their exciting day at sea. With breathtaking views of the ocean and a colorful array of fish, Ryan’s passion for saltwater fishing shines through. The episode wraps up with a reflection on the beauty and bounty of Palm Beach County waters.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Every spring brings a new opportunity to take a step forward & recall the memories of seasons past. World War II Veteran and retired Judge Arden Hill has spent most of his life chasing turkeys in the hills of Tennessee. Now in his 90’s, Arden doesn’t let age stand in the way of his love for spring turkey hunting. Also: patterning turkey shotguns and hunting spring gobblers.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Winchester introduces the Shoot United brand aimed at offering useful information and tips to the millions of new shooters entering the shooting sports. New York native and Midland University competitive shotgun shooter Amy Cawley and her journey as a student-athlete is followed. Also: Theo Ribbs gives shooting tips for competition and Foster Bartholow reviews Winchester AA Diamond Grade.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Getting a Crash Course in Bull Riding, Tex-Mex Cuisine & the Spirit of Texas - DIRT Texas"
programme.desc: Anyone can be a cowboy—that’s the biggest thing the DIRT crew learned in Texas. From riding bulls in Fort Worth to off-roading in the Chihuahuan desert to forging their own path across this vast state with the help of local trailblazers Liz and Lou Lambert. Lucky for us, they even stopped by Huckberry’s own backyard in Austin for a quick ruck and a couple games of chicken sh*t bingo. When the dust finally settled, we fired up the barbecue for our beefiest feast yet and raised our ranch waters high to 10 DIRT episodes in the can.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "The ULTIMATE Ireland Food Road Trip - Surfing, Golfing & Delicious Eats"
programme.desc: For DIRT’s first trip across the pond, host Josh Rosen dove head first into Ireland. From long-held traditions to the modern-day artisanal movement, he unearthed the multicultural goldmine between the highlands and the Wild Atlantic Way—with stops for surfing, a seaweed bath, and a couple holes of golf spectated by free-range goats, of course. Foraged cocktails? Fresh crabs from Galway Bay? It’s all on the table in this episode rooted in community, homegrown ingredients, and the damn good people who bring it all together. Subscribe to our YouTube channel to catch up on all of DIRT’s past adventures.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Can You Surf & Eat Like a Local in Minnesota? Wild Foraging & Delicious Local Eats"
programme.desc: In Episode 3, Josh starts off in the Twin Cities where he meets up with Yia Vang, an award-winning Hmong chef and restaurant owner, bringing his family’s traditions and flavors to the American Midwest. As Josh heads up north to Duluth and the boundary waters, he’ll meet plenty of farmers and foragers—harvesting mushrooms, wild rice, and catching a few fish (and waves) along the way. It all wraps up with an epic feast hosted by Yia back in the cities.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.sub-title: "Palm Beach in the new Invincible Catamaran"
programme.desc: Captains Scott Walker and Steve Rodger break in their new Invincible Catamaran with a trip to fish out of Palm Beach with their friend Captain Dave Fields.

programme.title: Fishing With Jay
programme.desc: READY TO ROLL!!…almost - We have our bus. We have our boat. And we have Mr. J. Rockfish on board to steer the ship. But before we can hit the road, we’ve got some work to do. - The bus…it needs a new motor and maybe some other stuff (TBD) that’s been hiding under 40 years of crust and crud… - The boat, it needs some fiberglass work. A casting platform and floor would be cool…maybe a paint job. - And Jay, well his gear is pretty shot, and his normally ripped physique has been obscured under some COVID poundage he acquired over the past year or so…And maybe a pedicure and haircut are in order before stepping in front of the camera… - First, the bus. A little interior decorating perhaps. - The 14 seats built for preschoolers don’t quite accommodate over-sized fishing dudes. And, come to find out, there are no rod racks. No bar. No stereo. No beds. No fly-tying stations. And no beer fridge. How did those kids survive? - Time to gut this thing…Check it out! #fishingwithjay.

programme.title: Fishing With Jay
programme.sub-title: "Fly Fishing For Snook in Indian River Lagoon"
programme.desc: With Tampa Bay suffering from a tragic red tide, Court left his home waters to fish with Jay and Casey in our backyard, the flats of Indian River and Mosquito Lagoon.

programme.title: Life on the Line
programme.desc: World record fly fisherman Nathaniel Linville shares his journey from troubled youth and addiction to redemption through fly fishing. After hitting rock bottom, he finds purpose in sobriety and relentless dedication, ultimately rising to the top as a world-record permit angler in the Florida Keys.

programme.title: Local Lines
programme.desc: Brandon fishes with Robbie Crosnoe On Lake Henderson. These longtime buddies are dialed into the lake like no one else.

programme.title: The Direction
programme.desc: The Direction stays close to home, and gets the privilege of fishing a beautiful private lake nestled into the hills of Kentucky. Mark’s special guest this week is Gabe Glasscock of Glasscock Log and Lumber. Gabe’s family run business ships lumber worldwide; in fact, they’re one of the largest producers of aromatic red cedar in the U.S.

programme.title: Operation Healing Heroes
programme.desc: U.S. Navy veteran John Fleming recounts the life altering effects of his traumatic brain injury which cost him his rank.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton goes down North Carolina to learn the family secrets of the Forehand family. Ben Forehand is a guitarist for Christian Contemporary artist Pat Barret. When Ben isn’t playing guitar, he runs Wild and Free Outfitters getting people into the outdoors hunting and fishing, getting their minds off of the everyday grind. . Even though fishing is tough the guys build strong friendships and lasting memories.

programme.title: Baitfuel Fishing Tournament
programme.desc: The final qualifier for the season finds the teams in Cardinal, Ontario, taking on the St. Lawrence River. It’s the last chance for teams to qualify for the Tour Championship.

programme.title: Sportsmans Journal
programme.desc: Staying mobile and drilling lots of holes while chasing roaming bluegills on the ice is the name of the game. Using larger baits like spoons also separates the littles from the Bulls!

programme.title: Louisiana Catch and Cook
programme.desc: When you bring a chef from Philadelphia to the bayou, you're in for an exciting adventure. Join Louisiana Celebrity Chef Jay Ducote (known as the guy who beat Bobby Flay), along with Philadelphia's own Chef Brian Duffy (famous from Bar Rescue), and Captain Craig as they kick off our two-part journey in the heart of Jefferson Parish, specifically in the fishing village of Lafitte. Experience Gator Town and the beautiful amenities at Elsa's Place, along with the thrill of reeling in redfish and speckled trout on the water. All of this is just a 45-minute drive from the New Orleans airport. What are you waiting for?

programme.title: Destination Dive
programme.desc: On this show we highlight some of the best diving in the lower Keys. From the wreck of the Vandenberg too the beautiful reefs in Key West, this show has it all.

programme.title: Ship Shape TV
programme.sub-title: Essentials - "Rub Rail Restoration & DIY Paint Bucket"
programme.desc: During this episode of Ship Shape TV Essentials the SSTV team does a - deep dive into a product founded by Engineered Marine Coatings called the Genius Bucket. The Genius Bucket being the ultimate DIY paint kit for those looking to tackle a marine painting job on there own. The team also checks out the capabilities it takes to restoring the older metal rub rail which derived from the Glastron project.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: For Capt. Justin Leake, sight fishing the beach is one of the most productive, and FUN ways to fish. When that doesn’t work, Capt. Todd Jones suggests fishing an artificial reef, and as it turns out, that’s where dinner lives.

programme.desc: 82 year old Navy veteran with more than 2.7 million TikTok followers, Patriotic Kenny talks of how he helps other vets through him gifting mobility scooters to fellow veterans in need.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.sub-title: "North American Deer Slam - Mexican Texanus Whitetail"
programme.desc: Continuing on with his quest for The North America Deer Slam, Mark Peterson packs his Gunwerks Nexus 300 PRC rifle for a hunt in Mexico targeting the elusive Mexican Texanus Whitetail from elevated blinds. programme.title: The Journey Within

We recap standout runs from Sam Finley, Donald Cupp, and Gabriel Clauson across Women’s, Seniors, and Juniors, plus highlight new Pro partnerships, including Erick Davis & Austin Waskow and the Traiteur brothers teaming up. - In Buy or Sell, the crew debates the hottest storylines out of Texas, Sam Finley’s early Women of the Year bid, and whether Jamie Graham has re-secured his spot as the Man of the Year favorite. We wrap it up with bold predictions in our “Hole-y Hot Take” finale.

programme.title: Road to the Unthinkable
programme.desc: The Quest for the Motorcycle Triple Backflip (narrated by Johnny Knoxville)òis the story about the attempt for the most dangerous trick in the history of action sports. The Road to the Unthinkable recounts the progression of the motorcycle backflip.ò The film tells the story of the very first competitive backflip by Carey Hart in 2000, Travis Pastrana landing his iconic double backflip at the X Games six years later, and finally the legendary quest of three men (Travis Pastrana, Thomas Pags, and Josh Sheehan) to ride away from worldís first motorcycle triple backflipîa feat thought to be totally impossible.ò This is the story of the dramatic evolution of what is possible and the athletes who risk life and limb to redefine the boundaries of human performance. òòA full decade and a half after the first motorcycle backflip was attempted, the death-defying triple backflip was finally within reach. THE ROAD TO THE UNTHINKABLE follows this quest as three FMX riders and close friends push each other to the edge and back and try to write their names in the history books.ò ò.

programme.title: Miss Conception
programme.desc: Georgina (Heather Graham) is a successful businesswoman living in London. She believes the only thing missing in her life is a baby, but her boyfriend (Tom Ellis) doesn't want kids. To make matters worse, Georgina's doctor (Nicholas Le Prevost) informs her that she has only one egg left, and she'll be ovulating only for the next four days.

programme.title: Addicted to Fresno
programme.desc: Two sisters (Natasha Lyonne, Judy Greer) stage a cover-up when one accidentally kills a guest at the hotel where they work as maids.

programme.title: Broken
programme.desc: Three suburban English families' lives intertwine with tragic consequences.

programme.title: Brooklyn Rules
programme.desc: Brooklyn, 1985. With the mob world as a backdrop, three life-long friends struggle with questions of love, loss and loyalty.

programme.title: Resistance
programme.desc: After the Nazis successfully invade Britain, a German platoon reaches the Welsh valleys, only to find that all the men of the region have headed for the hills to muster a resistance movement.

programme.title: What Lies Ahead
programme.desc: When two young women are thrown together on an unexpected road trip, an aggressive peril emerges between them that grows stronger with each passing mile.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain A Cooks Tour Cobra Heart Foods That Make You Manly
A Beautiful Life
programme.desc: On the rough streets of Los Angeles, an unlikely romance is born when Maggie, a down-on-her-luck runaway, meets a kindhearted illegal immigrant, David, trying to make a new home away from El Salvador as a nightclub busboy.

programme.title: Craigslist Joe
programme.desc: With only a laptop computer, cell phone, toothbrush and the clothes on his back, Joseph Garner sets out to survive for 31 days solely on items gleaned from Craigslist.

programme.title: For Your Height Only
programme.desc: A diminutive secret agent (Weng Wang) uses his skills with guns and gun molls to rescue a kidnapped scientist.

programme.title: All Stars
programme.desc: Lance returns to coaching softball and is saddled with the 10-and-under team. As he teaches the girls the basics, he is forced to ride herd over their delusional parents, whose horrible behaviour threatens to ruin the experience for their children.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain A Cooks Tour A Pleasing Palate
Anthony Bourdain A Cooks Tour Dining With Geishas
21 Years Richard Linklater
programme.desc: Animated sequences and interviews with Matthew McConaughey, Ethan Hawke, Billy Bob Thornton, Jason Reitman and others illustrate the career of groundbreaking director Richard Linklater.

programme.title: 30 Nights of Sex
programme.desc: In a last-ditch effort to save their marriage, Nick and Willa visit a renowned, yet eccentric, couples therapist and embark on a month-long journey of provocative and hilarious sex assignments.

programme.title: Whose Line is it Anyway
programme.desc: Questions Only, Film & Theater Styles, Props, Foreign Film Dub, Party Quirks, Psychiatrist.

programme.title: Whose Line is it Anyway
programme.desc: Rory Bremner, Colin Mochrie, Greg Proops, Ryan Stiles. and Richard Vranch are the experts for this episode.

programme.title: Whose Line is it Anyway
programme.desc: Stephen Frost, Colin Mochrie, Brad Sherwood, Ryan Stiles, and Richard Vranch are the ad-libbing masterminds.
